description:
At roughly 2,000 meters in length and over 700 meters high, the Meltlan Cruiser is notable move away from the sleek and lengthy designs typical of the Meltlandi capital ships. Nonetheless, the Meltlan Cruiser is another powerful addition to the female Meltrandi forces and is always part of any Meltlandi fleet.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-cruiser.htm
name: Meltlan Cruiser
